title: Daughter of Darkness
tags: journey to the house of grief
find a way into the cloister
content: Nautiloid - and infected with a parasite. We learned that Shadowheart needs to reach Baldur's Gate to fulfill a mission for her goddess - though the details of that mission are a mystery. We witnessed Shadowheart become stricken by an unusual surge of pain, emanating from a tiny, unhealed wound on her hand. We spoke to Shadowheart about the pain that her mysterious wound inflicted on her. She pleaded ignorance, though she may be witholding something. Although Shadowheart tried to hide it, we dis
